content: Randaam shushroosha
Praarambhapraarththhana

Maranamullllavare paapamaranatthilninnu rakshippaanaayi jadaprakaaram maricha nallavanum, maranamillaatthavanumaayullllove! Anithyamaaya ee lokatthilninnu ninte karunayilulllla sharanatthil vaangippoyirikkunna nyangallude sahodariyaaya (innaarkk) vendi ippoll ninnodu nyangall apekshikkunnu. Aathmaavil poornnamaaya aashvaasam ivallkku nee saujanyamaayikkodukkaname. Ninte raajyatthilulllla virunnil thozhmakkaarikallodu koode ivalle nee irutthaname. Entennaal nee jeevanullllavanum jeevippikkunnavanumaakunnu. Utthamanum manushyare snehikkunnavanumaaya pithaavum puthranum vishuddha roohaayumaaya eka daivame, ninakku ennekkum bahumaanam kadappettirikkunnu. Hosho.........Aammeen
(kukkiliyon aaraam niram)

Vaazhtthuka naathhane ennaathmaave-haaleluyyaa
Orkkuka thal prathidaanangall.

Naashamozhichavanam cheyyum-haaleluyyaa
Vedanakallkkekum shamanam.
Baarekmor, shubaho... Menaolam …
(ekkbo)

Ente shareeram bhakshichen
Raktham paanam cheyyunnon
Ennilamarnnidumavanil thaan
Nyaanumamarnnidumavasaanam
Jeevan nyaanavanekidume-
Nnothiya ni-n mozhi niravettaan
Vishvaasamezhum mrthalokam
nin varavin-divasatthinnaayu
Nokkippaarkkunnen naathhaa!
Nin prathyaa-shayil nidritharaam
ninnadiyaare kartthaave!
Krpayaal jeevippikkenam.
Sthaumenkaalos…

items.content: Naashatthode vithaykkappedunna marichavare naasham koodaathe uyirppikkukayum, apamaanatthaal vithaykkappedunnavare, mahathvatthode jeevippikkukayum, chithari irikkunnavayum balaheenathayullllavayumaaya asthhikalle shakthi dharippikkukayum, jadeekamaaya shareerangallkku aathmeeyaavasthha nalkukayum cheythavanaaya jnyaanamulllla srashdaavum sthhirathayode naveekarikkunnavanum aaya thanne naam ortthu mahathvappedutthanam. Thanikk..

Maranamillaatthavanum azhivillaatthavanumaaya daivavum, maranamullllathum azhivullllathumaaya nyangallude svabhaavatthinte naathhanum, srashdaavum shareerangallilirikkunnavarum shareerangallilninnu purappettupokunnavarumaaya sakalarudeyum dehikallum aathmaakkallum thante kayyil irikkunnavanaayi neethimaanmaarude sharanavum punyavaanmaarude prathyaashayumaayullllove! Sakalarudeyum sahaayatthinum rakshaykkumaayi nee munpukootti sookshichukondu ivideyulllla aayussilum avideyulllla yaathrayilum ellaavanum uchithamaayirikkunnavaye nee nalkunnu. Ninte samrakshanayude parishodhikkappedaavathallaattha aazhatthin prakaaravum sakalattheyum kaviyunnathaaya ninte munnarivaal ee aayussilninnu ee aathmaavine nee neekkiyirikkunnu. Ninte anugrahangallude sampatthin prakaaravum, aardrakarunayin prakaaravum ithinodukoode anuyaathracheythu avideyulllla bhayangkara kadavukallil athinu neridunnathaaya prathikoola ethirppukallilninnu athine veendukollllunnavaraaya samaadhaanadoothanmaar moolam ithine nee kaikkollllaname. Ee ninte daasi manassodum manassukoodaatheyum arivodum arivukoodaatheyum cheythittulllla paapangalleyum thinmakalleyum nee punyamaakki ninte allavillaattha anugrahangallude bahuthvaprakaaram, nee kshamichu maayichukallayaname. Nyangallellaavarum poozhiyaakunnennum, paapangallaal bandhikkappettirikkunnuvennum sthreeyilninnu janichirikkunnavaril ninte mumpaake kuttamillaatthavanillennum, oru naazhikapolumengkilum bhoomiyil paapam koodaathe jeevippaanum vasippaanum kazhiyunnathallennum nee ortthukollllaname. Ennaalo kartthaave! Hrdayapoorvvam ninte adukkal nyangall sangkadatthode nilavillikkunnathinaal karunayullllavaneppoleyum ellaavarodum karuna cheyyunnavaneppoleyum ninte krpayum manushyasnehavum ivallude pakkal nee kaanikkaname. Prakaashatthinte bhavanangallilum svargatthil perezhuthappettirikkunna aadyajaathanmaarude oorshlemyasabhayil svargeeya aashvaasasthhalangallilum ivalle nee vasippikkaname. Nirvyaajamaaya ninte vachanaprakaaram shakthiyodum valiya mahathvatthodumkoode aakaashameghangallinmel nee ezhunnallllivarukayum ninte vishuddha maalaakhamaarmoolam aakaashatthinte naalu konukallilninnu ninte theranyedukkappettavare nee kootticherkkukayum, sakalattheyum jeevippikkunna ninte shabdatthaal kabarukallil irikkunnavar uyirtthezhunnelkkukayum cheyyumpoll kartthaave! Innu nyangallude idayilninnu verpettu vaangippoyirikkunna ee ninte daasiye anugrahangallude smaranayaal nee ortthukollllaname. Avalludeyum nyangalludeyum lajaakaramaaya pravrtthikalleyum nyangallude nindyamaaya kaaryangallude naanattheyum, ninte bhayangkara simhaasanatthin mumpaake ninte karuna moodikkallayumaaraakaname. Kartthaave! Ninte svaroopatthilum, saadrshyatthilum nee nyangalle srshdikkukayum ninte vishuddha thrkkekallaal nee nyangalle menanyundaakkukayum nyangall nashdappettathinte shesham ninte vi. Kashdaanubhavangallaal nyangalle rakshikkukayum ninte thirushareerarakthangallil nyangalle sambandhippikkukayum cheythu. Nyangallude vaakkukallkkum pravrtthikallkkum anusaranamaayi nee nyangalle vidhikkumengkil manushyajaatham cheythittulllla nyangallkkellaavarkkum durithamaakunnu. Aakayaal utthamane! Dayathonni kshamikkaname. Karunayullllavane! Manassaliyaname. Ninte mumpaakeyundaakunna sakala lajayilninnum naanatthilninnum varuvaanirikkunna narakavedanakallilninnum nyangalle rakshichu veendukollllaname. Vilapichirikkunnavare aashvasippikkaname. Duഃkhithare dhairyappedutthaname. Paapangallaalum thinmakallaalum malinappettirikkunnavare kuttamillaattha nalla avasaanatthinum ninte varavinte avasaananaallil ninte mumpaakeyulllla mukhaprasaadatthinum yogyaraakkaname. Entennaal daivame! Nee sakalarodum karunacheyyunnavanum, manushyare snehikkunnavanumaaya daivamaakunnu. Ninakku sthuthiyum bahumaanavum krthajnyathayum yogyamaakunnu. Hosho…

content: (maaneeso)
Pethgomo:- neethiyin vaathil enikkaayu thurannu tharaname.

Svargeeyaamgyam vathsalare!
aathmatthe meyyathilninnum
Neekki nayippaan vaanavare
Vittidumaa samayam ghoram.

Doothanmaare doorekka-
Ndaathmaavantika vaasikalle
Sharanam praapichudane than
charithatthe parishodhippoo.

Paapamaleemasamaanengkil
Thaapamodaathmam kezhunnu
Salkkarmmangalle darshichaal
Ullkkuthukatthodotheedum.

Deveshaa! Nintirumeyyum
Rakthavumenne nee theetti
Nyaayasthhaanatthava randum
Dhairyamenikkekeedatte.
Shuddhanmaarude koottatthil
Sthothram nyaan paadum sthothram.
Moriyo ...
(kolo-mshaalam nuharo)

Likhitham-polavasaanadine
Paarum-vaanum maayumpoll
/tthaaram sakalam veezhumpoll
/tjyothirnnikaram neengumpoll
Naathhaa!-saadhvikallotthenne
Kaattheedenam-vaazhtthum nyaan ninne.
Baarekmor. Shubaho…

Muthalokatthil laasarinum
Yaayee-rosin puthrikkum
/tvidhavaanandananum jeevan
/tdaanam cheythoru shabdam thaan
Ninne-punaruththhaanatthil
Mannithil ninnum jeevippikkatte.
(kolo-malkko mahanmono)

Ninnishdam cheythoru-dhaarmmikar than praarththhanayaale
Jeevithalakshye-vishraamam nedi
Antye-sarvveshaa-ninnude karunaabhaajanamaayu
Nintirunaamam-sthuthi cheyyenamivall.
Baarekmor. Shubaho-menaolam....

En gaa-thram bhakshi-chuyirelum rudhiram paanam
Cheythone nyaan-vediyaa sheeyollil
Ennaa-lavanennum-jeevippaan nyaan mrthanaaye-
Nneeshan chonno-raa vachanam sthuthyam.
(madarosho-hablan moraan)

Mrthare uththhaanatthil-svar-ge
Kaa-nmaan-kartthaave! Bhaagyam nalkee-de-nam.

Neethividheeshanodaathmaa-ve-vam
Yaa-chichotheedunnathu nyaan kette-nallo
Mrthigathare prathi naathhaa!-a-nge-
Ykkarppikkum balikalli-lenne rodhi-kka-lle.

Paapikalleennum shishda-nmaa-re
Ve-raakkeedaanee-renmaar vanneedumpoll
Kaarunyatthin chirakin-kee-zhil
Naa-thhaa! Chertthivalle-kaakkuka naraka-tthinnum.

Ivalle vidhicheedaruthe-naa-thhaa!
Jee-vippavarilevan-vimalan thirumu-mpaa-ke
Naa-thhaa! Ivallil sthhithi che-ythee-dum
Ni-nnohari agni-kkirayaayu nalkee-da-lle.
Moriyo…
(maar apreminte bovuso)

Aardrathayaal naathhaa devaa!
Daasikkekaname punyam
Ninmahimodayanaall thannil
Nirtthaname valamaayivalle.

Ivalle dharmmishdhanmaaro-
Tthanpaal nee paarppikkenam
Doshatthe orttheedaathe
Veezhchakalle maayikkenam.

Praarththhanakettivalle punyam
Cheythorodonnaakkenam.
Aa nirayil sthothram naathhaa!
Paadeedattivall ninperkkaay.
Mrtharum jeevikkunnorum
Vaazhttheedum ninneyennum.

Aardrathayaal naathhaa devaa!
Daasikkekaname punyam
Ninmahimodayanaall thannil
Nirtthaname valamaayivalle.
